attributes.action: Acknowledge and discuss the rise of fascism in Europe and how to combat it.
attributes.additional_details:
Percentages of far right nationalist parties share of the vote in recent national elections not exhaustive list.

Sweden - Sweden Democrats 17.6%
Finland - The Finn's 17.7% 
Denmark - The Danish People's Party 21%
Estonia - Conservative People's Party 17% 
Netherlands - Freedom Party 13%
Germany - Alternative For Germany 12.6% 
France - National Rally 13%
Switzerland - Swiss People's Party 29% 
Austria - Freedom Party 26% 

https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.bbc.com/news/amp/world-europe-36130006
attributes.background: Far right fascist organizations and parties are growing to a worrying level in a lot of central Europe, far right extremism is a threat to international security and human rights, the UK needs to fully acknowledge this and discuss how to work with European leaders on how to combat this issue.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
